body:
IATI Switcheroo
converts your IATI data into csv, json, xml and html and back again.
CSV ➡ JSON ➡ XML ➡ HTML ➡
Data conversion is made locally in the browser and never sent to an external server.
Project page, issues and feedback on Github
head:
<meta charset="UTF-8">

<title>{title}</title>

<script type="text/javascript" src="js/switcheroo.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript">
	require("switcheroo").start()
</script>

{css}

title: IATI Switcheroo
